mapper.select: select a.id as commentId, a.content, a.user_id, b.username, b.avatar, b.gender, a.parent_id, a.create_time from comment a, user b where parent_id = #{parentId} and a.user_id = b.id limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into comment(content, blog_id, user_id, parent_id) value (#{content}, #{blogId}, #{userId}, #{parentId})
